permissions: Admins can update any follow. Non-admins can update follows only when they are the follower.
side_effects: Updates the follower and/or creator relationships on the follow.
validation_notes: The follow id argument is required. --creator cannot be combined with --creator-type or --creator-id. If --creator is used it must be in the format type|id. --creator-type and --creator-id must be used together. At least one of --follower, --creator, or --creator-type/--creator-id must be provided. Creator must be in scope for the follower. Creator type must be a valid post creator type. Follower and creator must be unique for a follow.

flags.name: --creator
flags.validation: Format: type|id (e.g., projects|123). Cannot be combined with --creator-type or --creator-id.
